column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////And here the fabulous treatment continued.  Our server
column3: was also great- quick with suggestions and helping my picky friend find something that she would eat.  But then he cinched the deal for me by bringing a basket of bread.  Not just any kind of bread but freshly made bread (made on premise) with thick crust and warm
column5: the way all bread should be.  And when you slather it with the soft butter
